title: jecs
author: jecs
content: Good afternoon, Considering the seriousness and commitment of the members of this forum, I want to present an idea of ​​a DAO that I seek to carry out and it seems very valuable to expose it to all the participants to receive the respective feedback and measure the degree of acceptance. of that idea.The idea is the following:DAO whose mission is to generate a self-sustaining society model in organic food and natural medicineThis project was born due to the economic crisis that is affecting the whole world, super expensive food, the manipulation of food, medicines worldwide and also many censorships at the level of medical institutions when the covid.In short, the vision is that people have freedom in terms of food and health without economic manipulation.How to be part of it:Being an investor or contributing user (the latter starts as an investor)Buy a package of governance tokensWith which decisions can be made by voting and with these tokens they can also be exchanged for products or seeds that the contributing user produces and offers through a Marketplace.https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LM9dbGTI0V1qB3nuzfFF1aGVBx3PNTUE/view?usp=sharing https://dao.finanzasparatodo.com/wp/encuesta-survey I appreciate your valuable comments to refine this idea
